member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.GetData(System.String,System.String,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Looks for the "tag" inside the "lkString", and extracts its value.
member.param: A string obtained as a result of executing an operation.
The tag to looking for
Delimiter char of every main items in "lkString".
Delimiter char inside the first item of "lkString". The first item of "lkString" is always the header tags (THISLIST).

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.SplitArray(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Auxiliary function to extract arrays inside a tag value.
member.param: The string to be splitted.
The char to use for split.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeRecordIds(System.String[])
member.summary: Composes the final string of various "recordsIds". Used by CRUD Operations.
member.param: Array with the "recordIds" to be joined
member.returns: The final string of "recordIds" to be used by CRUD Operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeRecords(System.String[])
member.summary: Composes the final string of various "records". Used by CRUD Operations.
member.param: Array with the "records" to be joined.
member.returns: The final string of "records" to be used by CRUD Operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeOriginalRecords(System.String[])
member.summary: Composes the final string of various "originalRecords". Used by CRUD Operations.
member.param: Array with the "originalRecords" to be joined.
member.returns: The final string of "originalRecords" to be used by CRUD Operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeDictionaries(System.String[])
member.summary: /// Composes the final string of various "dictClauses". Used by Read and Select Operations.
member.param: Array with the "dictionaries" to be joined.
member.returns: The final string of "dictionaries" to be used by Read and Select Operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeExpressions(System.String[])
member.summary: Composes the final string of various "expressions". Used by Format and Conversion Operations.
member.param: Array with the "expressions" to be joined.
member.returns: The final string of "expressions" to be used in Format and Conversion Operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeSubroutineArgs(System.String[])
member.summary: Composes the final string of various "arguments" of a subroutine.
member.param: Array with the "arguments" to be joined.
member.returns: The final string to be used in Subroutine Operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.JoinArray(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Auxiliary function to compose the final string of multiple items using "delimiter" as separation char.
member.param: The "items" to be joined.
The "delimiter" char between the "items".
member.returns: The final string with the different items joined by "delimiter" char.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeUpdateBuffer(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compose the fully buffer of the Update Operations with the block of "recordIds", "records" and "originalRecords".
member.param: Block of "recordIds". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecordIds function.
Block of "records". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecords function.
Block of "originalRecords". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecords function.
member.returns: The buffer to be used by Update Operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.Strings.StringFunctions.ComposeUpdateBuffer(System.String[],System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Compose the fully buffer of the Update Operations with the block of "recordIds", "records" and "originalRecords".
member.param: Block of "recordIds". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecordIds function.
Block of "records". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecords function.
Block of "originalRecords". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecords function.
member.returns: The buffer to be used by Update Operations.

member.summary: Compose the fully buffer of the New Operations with the block of "recordIds" and "records".
member.param: Block of "recordIds". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecordIds function.
Block of "records". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecords function.
member.returns: The buffer to be used by New Operations.

member.summary: Compose the fully buffer of the New Operations with the block of "recordIds" and "records".
member.param: Block of "recordIds". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecordIds function.
Block of "records". You can obtain this block with ComposeRecords function.
member.returns: The buffer to be used by New Operations.
